S.FORM: Randy Allen 1 bulad 26 demiad, 1965 a mihca, Randy Allen, miunduay. Randy Allen unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. Randy Allen nalecuhan i Milton, Florida, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. kakuniza nu kawaw: namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
